pages.title: Narrow Sawfish
pages.text: Sawfish display a circumglobal distribution in warm marine and freshwater habitats.$(br2)Their extant biodiversity is limited to five species belonging to two genera ($(o)Pristis and Anoxypristis).$(br2)The sawfishes are characterised by the long, narrow, flattened rostrum or extension on their snout.

pages.title: Narrow Sawfish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: None Days
